title: (x) "Jürgen Nowel" Vienna Workshop style font - Diehl Deco {Mike F}
content:
I'm looking to buy the font used on the links on this gorgeous website:

[http://www.polsterei-nowel.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226170522/http:/www.polsterei-nowel.de/ "http://www.polsterei-nowel.de/")

Anyone know? I'd email the webmaster, but I only speak English ...

AK
author: • Type ID Board [OLD]

comments.content: That's [Diehl Deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150226170522/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lab/a_d.htm) a nifty revival of "1940 lettering by Wooster Bard Field". The download includes a splendid 2nd font of alts and ligatures. Note also that the main font has different uppercase letters in the upper- and lowercase slots.

Mike,

Wow - thank you so much!! What a great font collection, too - I'm off to explore that website. I really appreciate the link.

\*chocolates to you\*
